articles.title: Hardik Pandya has a heartfelt reaction to Sanju Samson's post after wicketkeeper gets ruled out of SL T20Is - Times Now
articles.description: Hardik Pandya gave a heartfelt reaction to Sanju Samson's Instagram post after he got ruled out of the T20I series against Sri Lanka. Samson suffered a knee issue during the opening T20I and got ruled out of the remainder of the series. He was replaced by Jit…
